about_the_game:
Lustful Assistant is a visual novel exclusively for adults! This story tells the story of a guy who hired a very sexy girl. Working together, they became very close. Their communication very quickly led to sex.

In this wonderful game you have to plunge into the story of a guy who worked hard and hard at work as a boss. At some point he needed an assistant. He hired a very sexy girl. She worked very well and helped him in everything, not only in work, but also in sex. Get real pleasure from a very simple gameplay and cool music.

Beautiful graphics!
Relaxing music!
Exciting sex scenes!

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
